item.title: Remove please
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:13, topic:476950”][quote author=Fails link=topic=595113.msg4191294#msg4191294 date=1356837031]

Write a new tutorial that will actually benefit people

Holy shit, you’re a dick.
[/quote]
how :([/quote]
You srs?

Anyways on topic:
You shouldn’t delete your snippets/tuts w.e. because people do find it useful a lot of people lurk and don’t comment. Ik a lot of things that have helped me aren’t necessarly good but they’ve got the job done and thats better than nothing. People always hate, you just ignore it and move on. Random people on forums opinions shouldn’t matter to you unless you believe they are worth caring about and most of them aren’t worth caring about(carefully worded but it still is a badly worded sentence -.-).

Read full topic

item.title: Remove please
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Here’s my advice:

Read up on Java here: http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/index.html
Look at some quality tutorials and compare them to yours
Get an IDE here: http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/moreinfo/java.php
Improve. This could take weeks, months, or even years
Write a new tutorial that will actually benefit people

Read full topic

Your ‘tuts’ aren’t worthy of anyone’s opinion.

Instead of saying its bad you could better say what i have to improve.[/quote]its a not an. lol[quote=“luna-scape, post:3, topic:476950”][quote author=strucker link=topic=595113.msg4190852#msg4190852 date=1356790596]
